tags.label: Tags
tags.placeholder: Add tags to organize and find this record
tags.description: Add tags to help organize and search for this record later

emptyState.title: No allergies found
emptyState.noData: Click "Add New Allergy" to get started.
emptyState.filtered: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

reaction.label: Reaction Description
reaction.description: Symptoms and details of the reaction

relatedMedication.label: Related Medication
relatedMedication.description: Link this condition to a specific medication

medicationName.label: Medication Name
medicationName.description: Generic or brand name of the medication (min. 2 characters)

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.description: How often the medication is taken

indication.label: Indication
indication.placeholder: e.g., High blood pressure, As needed for pain, Diabetes management
indication.description: What is this medication for? Describe the reason or condition being treated

testName.label: Test Name
testName.description: Name or description of the laboratory test

testType.label: Test Type
testType.description: Priority or urgency of the test

testStatus.label: Test Status
testStatus.description: Current status of the lab test

additionalNotes.label: Additional Notes
additionalNotes.placeholder: Any additional information about the test, special instructions, or observations...

ndcNumber.label: NDC Number
ndcNumber.description: National Drug Code for the vaccine

expirationDate.label: Vaccine Expiration Date
expirationDate.description: Expiration date of the vaccine vial/dose used

location.label: Location
location.placeholder: e.g., CVS Pharmacy, Hospital, Clinic, Health Department

additionalNotes.label: Additional Notes
additionalNotes.placeholder: Any reactions, side effects, or additional observations...
additionalNotes.description: Record any adverse reactions or important notes

procedureDuration.label: Duration (minutes)
procedureDuration.description: How long the procedure took/will take

complications.label: Complications
complications.placeholder: Any complications that occurred during the procedure...
complications.description: Document any complications, adverse events, or unexpected outcomes

clinicalNotes.label: Clinical Notes
clinicalNotes.description: Any additional clinical notes or observations

specialty.label: Medical Specialty
specialty.description: Select from list or type a custom specialty

rating.label: Rating
rating.description: Rate this practitioner's overall care quality

isPrimary.label: Primary Emergency Contact
isPrimary.description: This person will be contacted first in emergencies

reason.label: Reason for Visit
reason.placeholder: e.g., Annual Checkup, Follow-up, Symptoms Review
reason.description: Primary purpose of this medical visit

relatedCondition.label: Related Condition (Optional)
relatedCondition.placeholder: Select a condition this visit is related to
relatedCondition.description: Link this visit to a specific condition if applicable

chiefComplaint.label: Chief Complaint
chiefComplaint.description: Main health concern or symptom that prompted the visit

diagnosisAssessment.label: Diagnosis/Assessment
diagnosisAssessment.placeholder: Clinical assessment or diagnosis from the visit...

followUpInstructions.label: Follow-up Instructions
followUpInstructions.description: Instructions for ongoing care and follow-up appointments

pharmacyBrand.label: Pharmacy Brand
pharmacyBrand.description: Major pharmacy chain or independent type

treatmentName.label: Treatment Name
treatmentName.placeholder: e.g., Physical Therapy for Lower Back Pain
treatmentName.description: Specific name or description of the treatment

relatedCondition.label: Related Condition
relatedCondition.description: Link this treatment to a specific medical condition

practitioner.label: Practitioner
practitioner.description: Assign a practitioner to this treatment

treatmentDescription.label: Treatment Description
treatmentDescription.placeholder: Detailed description of the treatment plan...
treatmentDescription.description: Comprehensive details about the treatment approach

notes.label: Additional Notes
notes.placeholder: Progress notes, side effects, adjustments, outcomes...
notes.description: Progress updates, observations, or important notes

isDeceased.label: Deceased
isDeceased.description: Check if family member is deceased

planName.label: Plan Name
planName.description: Name of the specific insurance plan

memberId.label: Member ID
memberId.description: Member ID number from insurance card

isPrimary.label: Primary Insurance
isPrimary.description: Check if this is your primary insurance (for medical only)

copayPrimaryCare.label: Primary Care Copay
copayPrimaryCare.description: Copay amount for primary care visits

symptomName.label: Symptom Name
symptomName.placeholder: e.g., Migraine Headache, Chronic Back Pain
symptomName.description: Name of the symptom you want to track

firstOccurrenceDate.label: First Occurrence Date
firstOccurrenceDate.placeholder: When did you first experience this
firstOccurrenceDate.description: When you first noticed this symptom

isChronic.label: Chronic Condition
isChronic.description: Check if this is an ongoing/long-term symptom

typicalTriggers.label: Common Triggers
typicalTriggers.placeholder: Add common triggers (stress, weather, foods, etc.)

status.label: Overall Status
status.description: Current overall status of this symptom

generalNotes.label: General Notes
generalNotes.description: General information about patterns, history, or observations

timeOfDay.label: Time of Day
timeOfDay.description: When during the day did this occur

painScale.label: Pain Scale (0-10)
painScale.description: Rate pain level from 0 (none) to 10 (worst possible)

duration.label: Duration
duration.description: How long did this episode last

location.label: Location
location.placeholder: e.g., Left temple, Lower back, Entire body
location.description: Where on your body did you feel this

impactLevel.label: Impact on Daily Life
impactLevel.description: How much did this affect your daily activities

impactLevelOptions.noImpact: No Impact - Able to function normally

triggers.label: Triggers
triggers.placeholder: What triggered this episode (stress, food, weather, etc.)
triggers.description: Factors that may have caused or worsened this episode

reliefMethods.label: Relief Methods
reliefMethods.description: Things that provided relief for this episode

associatedSymptoms.label: Associated Symptoms
associatedSymptoms.description: Other symptoms that occurred with this episode

resolvedDate.label: Resolved Date
resolvedDate.description: Leave blank if still experiencing this episode

resolutionNotes.label: Resolution Notes
resolutionNotes.description: Details about how this episode ended or was treated

additionalNotes.label: Additional Notes
additionalNotes.description: Any other relevant information about this occurrence

name.label: Full Name
name.description: Full name of the family member

deceased.label: Deceased
deceased.description: Check if family member is deceased

notes.description: Any additional notes or important information
